name: The Maze Runner (not a ripoff)
description:
You are the maze runner. You must find the keys to advance in the maze and eventually find the exit.


Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move.

Credits for outside resources I used:

Player Model: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/humans/adventure-c...

Key Model: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/key-and-lock-193317

Door Sound: https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/431117/

Running Sound: https://freesound.org/people/Disagree/sounds/433725/ and https://freesound.org/people/Deathscyp/sounds/553944/

Fonts from 1001freefonts.com
